chapters.title: Chapter 17: The Wheel of a Life
chapters.info: Mangin, p. 290 (404)—Aiel of the Jindo Sept of the Taardad Aiel. He was one of the Aiel who came to the Stone of Tear when it fell. He is taller than Rand, and has gray eyes. He killed a Cairhienin man who had a dragon tatooed on his arm in imitation of a clan chief's; he was hanged in accordance with Rand's law in Cairhien. He placed the noose around his own neck, and turned himself in.
